note: I am a meat popsicle.  I’m into life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness/property. I believe we should love, live, and let live. Your rights extend as far as someone else’s begin. We’re a constitutional republic, not a democracy. I adore my personal protections from the tyranny of the 51%.  Love open source, free thinking, privacy, anonymity, deep thoughts, and all things fascinating and inexplicable. Open-mindedness and empathy are key, and I’m ever the devil’s advocate.

name: Privacy-respecting frontends
value: https://github.com/mendel5/alternative-front-ends
